title: But Why: Intro For Adults
description: My name is Jane Lindholm and I'm hosting a new podcast for kids from Vermont Public Radio. We're calling the show But Why: A Podcast for Curious Kids. And it's designed to be something you and your kids can listen to on long rides in the car, at the dinner table, or whenever you’re in the mood for learning something new. Think of it as public radio - made especially for kids.
itunes:subtitle: My name is Jane Lindholm and I'm hosting a new podcast for kids from Vermont Public Radio.
author: questions@butwhykids.org (Vermont Public)
